summary.overview: Lecture: L4a - Matrices and linear transformations. This lecture covers the following key concepts: - Animation typically involves interpolation, keyframe and easing. - Matrix typically involves determinant, inverse and transpose. - Rotation typically involves quaternion, euler angles and axis-angle. - Coordinate typically involves cartesian, polar and spherical. - Transformation typically involves translation, scaling and shear. Students should be able to explain these concepts and apply them to simple problems and examples.
